vilij.components

Class ConfirmationDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • vilij.components.ConfirmationDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, Dialog

    public class ConfirmationDialog
extends javafx.stage.Stage
implements Dialog
    This class provides the template for displaying three-way confirmation messages to the end user of a Vilij application. It always provides the two controls: (i) a customizable message, and (ii) a set of three buttons corresponding to the three standard options for the user. The three options (Yes, No, and Cancel are modeled as the inner enumerable class ConfirmationDialog.Option.
